name: Robot Box Cleaner
description:
Be a box, pickup stuff, move stuff. Drop items in the glowing trash.

All the levels are procedurally generated and all the objects are procedurally dropped in.

Arrow Keys/ WASD - Move

Space - Pick up/drop stuff

Ctrl - Boost

There is to goal. But you can pick up random items and drop them in the glowing trash.

-----
Made as part of TOJam - What TWELVEs below

Programming and Design - Jarryd Huntley

3D Modeling and Texturing - Indigo Doyle

Splash Image - Christine Laskowski
